title.rendered: Where in the World is ViaGen?

content.rendered:
Do you remember playing Where is Waldo as a kid?  Or maybe as an adult on the Today Show, Where in the World is Matt Lauer?  Well, how about a good ol’ game of Where in the World is ViaGen?

Every year ViaGen treks all over the country to attend some outstanding shows where we can meet and greet many of our beloved clients, future clients and Veterinary partners.  It is our pleasure to meet you where you are and educate you on the latest and greatest advances in Genetic Preservation and Cloning for Pets, Equine and Livestock.

So, lets get right to it.  Where will we be in 2017?

January

National Western Stock Show – Denver, CO.  Established in 1906, NWSS, is the premier livestock, rodeo, and horse show in the nation.  ViaGen representatives will be onsite at NWSS from January 9-19.  You can find us located on The Hill as you head towards The Yard.

International Embryo Transfer Society – Austin, TX. ViaGen staff members will be onsite to further their education from January 14-17.

Fort Worth Stock Show – Fort Worth, TX. Although this event runs from January 13 through February 4 you can find ViaGen representatives onsite Feb 1-4.

TICA International Cat Show – Portland, OR. Come visit us Jan 27-30 at booth V11 and explore The International Cat Association.

February

North Atlantic Veterinary Conference – Orlando, FL. Exciting news that this year the whole conference is all under one roof and not at three different locations!  Come visit us at booth 3319 Feb 4-8.

San Antonio Stock Show – San Antonio, TX. This show runs from Feb 9-26 and you can visit with us Feb 19-23.

Iowa Beef Expo – Des Moines, IA. February 12-19 come visit with a rep and learn more.

March

Western Veterinary Conference – Las Vegas, NV. Stop by and say hello at booth 907 March 5-9.

Houston Stock Show – Houston, TX. Visit us between March 7-11 although the show runs March 7-26.

Super Pet Expo – Chantilly, VA. We are excited to attend this pet show and will be in booth 305 from March 17-19.

American Animal Hospital Association – Nashville, TN. Join us in Music City March 30 through April 1 at booth 1004.

April

American’s Family Pet Expo – Costa Mesa, CA. Join us for some fun April 28-30.

May

Animal Agriculture Alliance – Kansas City, MO.  ViaGen reps will be onsite May 3-4.

Beef Improvement Federation – Athens, GA. May 31 through June 3.

June

World Pork Expo – Des Moines, IA. Come visit ViaGen representatives June 8-10.

Bio International Conference – San Diego, CA. Company representatives will be onsite June 19-22.

Pacific Veterinary Conference – Long Beach, CA. Join us under the sun June 29 through July 2.

July

American Veterinary Medical Association – Indianapolis, IN. July 21-25.

August

Society for Theriogenology – Fort Collins, CO. Our very own Dr. Shawn Walker will be a guest speaker.

CatCon – Pasadena, CA. August 12-13.

September

National Barrow Show – Austin, MN. September 9-13.

October

World Dairy Expo – Madison, WI. October 3-7.

American Royal – Kansas City, MO.

November

North American International Livestock Exposition – Louisville, KY.

December

TBD

Although you can find us at many shows throughout the year we cannot hit them all. So, if you have not been able to visit with us at a show please call us directly at (888) 876-6104 to learn more about ViaGen and the services we provide (Genetic Preservation and Cloning).

Stay up to date on Where in the World is ViaGen via our Facebook page.

-Lauren
